sentences.en: Hareton's chest heaved in silence a minute: he laboured under a severe sense of mortification and wrath, which it was no easy task to suppress.
sentences.cn: 哈里顿的胸膛默默地起伏了一下：他是在一种严重的屈辱与愤怒的感觉下苦斗，要压制下去是不容易的事。
他却尽在羞愧的圈子里打滚.

sentences.en: Manager : Ah! The famous Monsieur poirot. I grovel in mortification, I grovel !
sentences.cn: 乔德利: 啊,著名的波洛先生,我未免太失敬了, 失敬 了.

sentences.en: Miss Ophelia looked keenly at him, and saw the flush of mortification.
sentences.cn: 奥菲丽亚小姐用锐利的目光扫了一眼他脸上羞耻的红晕.

sentences.en: Myrrh has been associated with bitter repentance , mortification of the flesh, and penance.
sentences.cn: 没药与痛苦的悔改, 苦修, 忏悔联合.

sentences.en: Poverty for us is a freedom mortification, a penance.
sentences.cn: 贫穷对我们而言是一种自由.

sentences.en: The chairman tried to disguise his mortification.
sentences.cn: 主席试图掩饰自己的极度窘迫。

sentences.en: The niyamas ( observances ) are purity, contentment, mortification, study and devotion to God.
sentences.cn: 32精进是纯净 、 满足 、 苦行 、 研读和敬神.

sentences.en: To his mortification, he was criticized by the manager.
sentences.cn: 他被经理批评,感到很难堪.

sentences.en: To my mortification, my manuscript was rejected.
sentences.cn: 使我感到失面子的是:我的稿件被退了回来.
接二连三的丑事,真是祸不单行啊!

words.tran_cn: 痛心的；使人羞愧的；禁欲苦修的

trans.tran_cn: 屈辱，羞愧，失面子，<宗>禁欲
